clfKnn

PURPOSE

Create a k nearest neighbor classifier.

SYNOPSIS

function clf = clfKnn( p, k, metric )

DESCRIPTION 

 Create a k nearest neighbor classifier.

 USAGE
  clf = clfKnn( p, k, metric )

 INPUTS
  p       - data dimension
  k       - number of nearest neighbors to look at
  metric  - [] distance function, squared euclidean by default

 OUTPUTS
  clf     - model ready to be trained

 EXAMPLE

 See also NFOLDXVAL, CLFKNNTRAIN, CLFKNNFWD, CLFKNNDIST

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • clfKnnFwd Apply a k-nearest neighbor classifier to X.
  • clfKnnTrain Train a k nearest neighbor classifier (memorization).
This function is called by:
  • demoClassify DEMOCLASSIFY A demo used to test and demonstrate the usage of classifiers (clf*)
